mapper.select: select mem.userid, mem.userpw, mem.name, mem.enabled,mem.regdate, mem.updatedate, auth.auth From member mem left outer join member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid where mem.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, userpw, name, gender, phone, birth, address, email) values (#{userid},#{userpw},#{name},#{gender},#{phone},#{birth},#{address},#{email})
mapper.select: select userid, userpw, name, gender, phone, birth, address, email from member where userid=#{userid}
select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update member set userpw=#{userpw}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, email=#{email} where userid=#{userid}
